attributes.action: Abolition of prescription charges as they have done in Scotland
attributes.additional_details:
Can we please have the abolition of prescription charges as they have done in Scotland.

Prescription charges are a tax on ill health, and can be a barrier to good health for too many people.

The Scottish Government is fighting for a healthier nation; through tackling the health inequalities that still scar our nation and supporting people to live longer and lead healthier lives. Can the English government please do the same!
